an9.71:4.1: * “Pañcime, bhikkhave, cetokhilā.
an9.71:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati.
an9.71:4.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an9.71:4.5: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ paṭhamo cetokhilo.
an9.71:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme kaṅkhati … pe …
an9.71:5.4: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto.
an9.71:5.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an9.71:5.6: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ pañcamo cetokhilo.
an9.71:6.1: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ cetokhilānaṃ pahānāya … pe …
